abstract: After a strong opening that sent the Dow up more than 150 points, shares gave up their gains amid weaker-than-expected data on personal income and spending.
snippet: After a strong opening that sent the Dow up more than 150 points, shares gave up their gains amid weaker-than-expected data on personal income and spending.
lead_paragraph: Stocks soared early today, but gradually gave up much of their gains as investors weighed the bad news with the good.

headline.main: Stocks Surge, Then Give Up Early Gains
